ç»è¿‡å°æ–°ç¼œå¯†çš„æ€è€ƒä¸äº²èº«ä½“éªŒï¼Œå¿ä¸ä½åˆ†äº«ä¸€ä¸‹ç»™å¤§å®¶ã€‚æœ‰äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½å…´è¶£çš„æœ‹å‹ä»¬ï¼Œæ¨èå¤§å®¶ä¸€èµ·å­¦ä¹  ğŸ‰ç‚¹å‡»ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®ğŸ‰
é‡Œé¢æœ‰ä¸°å¯Œçš„äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½å­¦ä¹ èµ„æ–™ï¼ŒçœŸæ­£åšåˆ°ä»å…¥é—¨åˆ°å…¥åœŸï¼Œè¿˜ä¸å¿«æ¥ä¸€èµ·å­¦ä¹ ğŸğŸğŸ

ä¸ªäººåç‰‡ï¼š

ğŸ¼ä½œè€…ç®€ä»‹ï¼šä¸€åå¤§ä¸€åœ¨æ ¡ç”Ÿ
ğŸ»â€â„ï¸ä¸ªäººä¸»é¡µï¼šå°æ–°çˆ±å­¦ä¹ .
ğŸ¼ä¸ªäººWeChatï¼šhmmwx53
ğŸ•Šï¸ç³»åˆ—ä¸“æ ï¼šé›¶åŸºç¡€å­¦java ----- é‡è¯†cè¯­è¨€
ğŸ“æ¯æ—¥ä¸€å¥ï¼šé’å±±ä¸€ç‰‡äº‘é›¾å¿ƒå®‰å³å½’å¤„ã€‚

æ–‡ç« ç›®å½•

    • æ„æ€
      • ä¸»ç±»(ShootGame)
      • è‹±é›„æœº(Hero)
      • é£è¡Œç‰©(FlyingObject)
      • å­å¼¹(Bullet)
      • å¥–åŠ±èœœèœ‚(Bee)ç±»
      • æ•Œé£æœºç±»(AirPlane)
      • å¥–åŠ±æ¥å£
      • è®¡åˆ†æ¥å£
    • æºç å›¾ç‰‡è·å–ï¼Œå¾®ä¿¡ç§

æ„æ€

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œè¦æŠŠæ•´ä½“çš„æ¸¸æˆæ¡†æ¶å’Œå†…å®¹æ„æ€å‡ºæ¥(æ ¹æ®é¢„å…ˆæ„æ€æ¸¸æˆé‡Œå­˜åœ¨çš„ç»„ä»¶å†…å®¹å’Œæ¸¸æˆåŠŸèƒ½æŠ½è±¡å‡ºæŒ‡å®šç±»)ã€‚ä»¥æˆ‘çš„å°æ¸¸æˆä¸ºä¾‹ï¼š

  • 1.ä¸»ç•Œé¢æ¡†æ¶ç±»ï¼š
    æ˜¾ç¤ºå¼€å§‹ç•Œé¢

  • 2.å¼¹å‡ºç•Œé¢ç±»ï¼š
    JDialog çª—ä½“çš„åŠŸèƒ½æ˜¯ä»ä¸€ä¸ªçª—ä½“ä¸­å¼¹å‡ºå¦ä¸€ä¸ªçª—ä½“ï¼Œå°±åƒæ˜¯åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ IE æµè§ˆå™¨æ—¶å¼¹å‡ºçš„ç¡®å®šå¯¹è¯æ¡†ï¼ŒJDialog çª—ä½“ä¸ JFrame çª—ä½“å½¢å¼åŸºæœ¬ç›¸åŒï¼Œè®¾ç½®çª—ä½“çš„ç‰¹æ€§æ—¶è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•åç§°éƒ½åŸºæœ¬ç›¸åŒï¼Œå¦‚è®¾ç½®çª—ä½“å¤§å°ã€çª—ä½“å…³é—­çŠ¶æ€ç­‰

  • 3.æ¸¸æˆé¢æ¿ç±»ï¼šGamePanel (extends JPanel)
    çœŸæ­£æ˜¾ç¤ºé£æœºå¤§æˆ˜åŠ¨æ€æ¸¸æˆç”»é¢ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¿˜æ·»åŠ äº†æŒ‰é’®JButtonç”¨äºæ§åˆ¶æ¸¸æˆå¼€å§‹æš‚åœã€‚

  • 4.ç©å®¶é£æœºç±»ï¼šHero
    ç§»åŠ¨ç©å®¶é£æœºã€ç”»ç©å®¶é£æœºç­‰å…¶ä»–ä¸ç©å®¶é£æœºç›¸å…³çš„æ–¹æ³•

  • 5.æ•Œæœºç±»ï¼šAirPlane
    ç§»åŠ¨æ•Œæœºã€ç”»æ•Œæœº

    ç§»åŠ¨å­å¼¹ã€ç»˜åˆ¶å­å¼¹

package cn.tede.shoot;

import javax.imageio.ImageIO;
import javax.swing.*;
import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.MouseAdapter;
import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Random;
import java.util.TimerTask;

//import static java.util.concurrent.locks.StampedLock.STATE;


public class ShootGame extends JPanel {
    public static final int WIDTH =400;
    public static final int HEIGHT =654;
    private int state;
    public static final int START = 0;
    public static final int RUNNING = 1;
    public static final int PAUSE = 2;
    public static final int GAME_OVER =4;

    public static BufferedImage background;
    public static BufferedImage start;
    public static BufferedImage airplane;
    public static BufferedImage bee;
    public static BufferedImage bullet;
    public static BufferedImage hero0;
    public static BufferedImage hero1;
    public static BufferedImage pause;
    public static BufferedImage gameover;

    private FlyingObject[] flyings = {}; //æ•Œæœºæ•°ç»„
    private Bullet [] bullets = {}; //å­å¼¹æ•°ç»„
    private Hero hero = new Hero();//è‹±é›„é¸¡

    private Timer timer;//å®šæ—¶å™¨
    private int intervel = 1000/100; //æ—¶é—´é—´éš”ï¼Œåæ¯«ç§’

    private int score = 0;//å¾—åˆ†
//    public ShootGame(){
        flyings  = new FlyingObject[2];
        flyings[0] = new AirPlane();
        flyings[1] = new Bee();
        bullets = new Bullet[1];
        bullets[0] = new Bullet(180,300);
//    }
    static{//é™æ€ä»£ç å—
        try {
            background= ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("background.png"));
            start= ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("start.png"));
            airplane = ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("airplane.png"));
            bee = ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("bee.png"));
            bullet = ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("bullet.png"));
            //bullet = ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("B1.png"));
            //hero0= ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("C.png"));
            hero0= ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("hero0.png"));
            hero1 = ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("hero1.png"));
            pause= ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("pause.png"));
            gameover = ImageIO.read(ShootGame.class.getResource("gameover.png"));

        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    @Override
    public void paint(Graphics g) {
        g.drawImage(background,0,0,null);//ç”»èƒŒæ™¯å›¾ç‰‡
        paintHero(g);
        paintBullets(g);
        paintFlyingObject(g);
        paintScore(g);//ç”»åˆ†æ•°
       // paintPause(g);
        paintState(g);


    }

    /**
     * ç”»æ¸¸æˆçŠ¶æ€
     *
     */
    public void paintState(Graphics g){
        switch(state){
            case START:
                g.drawImage(start,0,0,null);
                break;
            case PAUSE:
                g.drawImage(pause, 0, 0, null);
                break;
            case GAME_OVER:
                g.drawImage(gameover, 0, 0, null);
                break;
        }
    }

    /**
     * ç”»åˆ†æ•°
     * @param g
     */
    public void paintScore(Graphics g){
        Font font = new Font(Font.SANS_SERIF, Font.BOLD,4);
        g.setColor(new Color(0xffff0));//è®¾ç½®å­—ä½“

        g.drawString("SCORE"+score,10,25);
        g.drawString("LIFE"+hero.getLife(),10,45);
    }
    //ç”»è‹±é›„é¸¡
    public void  paintHero(Graphics g){
        g.drawImage(hero.getImage(),hero.getX(),hero.getY(),null);
    }
    //ç”»å­å¼¹
    public void paintBullets(Graphics g){
        for(int i = 0;i < bullets.length; i++){
            Bullet b = bullets[i];
            g.drawImage(b.getImage(),b.getX(),b.getY(),null);
        }
    }
    //ç”»é£è¡Œç‰©
    public void paintFlyingObject(Graphics g){
        for(int i = 0; i< flyings.length;i++){
            FlyingObject f = flyings[i];
            g.drawImage(f.getImage(),f.getX(),f.getY(),null);
        }
    }
//    //ç”»æš‚åœ
//    public void paintPause(Graphics g){
//        g.drawImage(pause,0,0,null);
//    }

    //éšæœºç”Ÿæˆé£è¡Œç‰©
    public static FlyingObject nextOne(){
        //è¿”å› é£è¡Œç‰©å¯¹è±¡
        Random random = new Random();
        int type = random.nextInt(20);//ç”Ÿæˆéšæœºæ•°0-19
        if(type == 0){
            return new Bee();
        }else{
            return new AirPlane();
        }
    }
    int flyEnterIndex = 0;
    //é£è¡Œç‰©å…¥åœº
    public void enterAction () {

        flyEnterIndex++;
        if (flyEnterIndex % 40 == 0) {//æ¯è°ƒç”¨40æ¬¡è¯¥æ–¹æ³•
            FlyingObject obj = nextOne();//éšæœºç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªé£è¡Œç‰©
            flyings = Arrays.copyOf(flyings, flyings.length + 1);//æ‰©å®¹
            flyings[flyings.length - 1] = obj;//æ”¾åœ¨æœ€åä¸€ä½
        }
    }


    /*
    å®ç°é£è¡Œç‰©ç§»åŠ¨
     */
    public void stepAction() {
        for (int i = 0; i < flyings.length; i++){
            FlyingObject f =  flyings[i];
            f.step();
        }
        for(int i = 0;i<bullets.length;i++){
            /**
             * å­å¼¹èµ°
             *
             */
            Bullet b = bullets[i];
            b.step();
//            bullets[i].step();
        }
        hero.step();
    }
    int shootIndex = 0;
    //å°„å‡»
    public void shootAction() {
        //è°ƒç”¨30æ¬¡è¯¥æ–¹æ³•å‘å°„ä¸€æ¬¡å­å¼¹ï¼Œ
        //è‹±é›„çº§æ‰“å‡ºå­å¼¹
        //æ‰©å®¹
        //è¿½åŠ æ•°ç»„
        shootIndex++;
        if (shootIndex % 30 == 0) {//æ¯è°ƒç”¨30æ¬¡è¯¥æ–¹æ³•
            Bullet [] bs = hero.shoot();//è‹±é›„é¸¡æ‰“å‡ºå­å¼¹
            bullets = Arrays.copyOf(bullets, bullets.length + bs.length);//æ‰©å®¹
            System.arraycopy(bs,0,bullets,bullets.length - bs.length,bs.length);
        }
    }


    public void bangAction() {
        for (int i = 0; i< bullets.length; i++){
            Bullet b = bullets[i];
            bang(b);
        }
    }

    private void bang(Bullet bullet) {
        int index = -1;
        for (int i = 0; i <flyings.length;i++){
            FlyingObject obj = flyings[i];
            if(obj.shootBy(bullet)){
                index = i;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(index != -1) {
            //å‡»ä¸­
            FlyingObject one = flyings[index];//è®°å½•è¢«å‡»ä¸­çš„é£è¡Œç‰©
            FlyingObject temp = flyings[index];//è¢«å‡»ä¸­çš„é£è¡Œç‰©ä¸æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªé£è¡Œç‰©äº¤æ¢
            flyings[index] = flyings[flyings.length - 1];
            flyings[flyings.length - 1] = temp;
            //åˆ é™¤æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªé£è¡Œç‰©(è¢«å‡»ä¸­çš„é£è¡Œç‰©)
            flyings = Arrays.copyOf(flyings, flyings.length - 1);

            //æ£€æµ‹oneçš„ç±»å‹ï¼Œè‹¥æœæ˜¯æ•Œäººå°±åŠ åˆ†


            if (one instanceof Enemy) {
                Enemy e = (Enemy) one;
                score += e.getScore();
            }
            if (one instanceof Award) {
                Award a = (Award) one;
                int type = a.getType();
                switch (type) {
                    case Award.DOUBLE_FIRE:
                        hero.addDoubleFire();
                        break;
                    case Award.LIFE:
                        hero.addLife();
                        break;
                }
            }
        }
        //å¦‚æœoneçš„ç±»å‹å°±å¥–åŠ±ï¼Œåˆ™è®¾ç½®å¥–åŠ±
    }

    /**
     * åˆ é™¤è¶Šç•Œçš„é£è¡Œç‰©å’Œå­å¼¹ï¼Œå°èœœèœ‚ï¼Œé£æœº
     */

    public void outOfBoundsAction() {
        int index = 0;
        FlyingObject[] flyingLives = new FlyingObject[flyings.length];//æ²¡æœ‰ç¢°æ’çš„é£è¡Œç‰©
        for (int i = 0; i < flyings.length; i++) {
            FlyingObject f = flyings[i];
            if (!f.outOfBounds()) {
                flyingLives[index++] = f;//æ²¡æœ‰è¶Šç•Œçš„å­˜å‚¨åˆ°æˆ–è€…çš„æ•°ç»„
            }
        }
        flyings = Arrays.copyOf(flyingLives, index);//æ²¡æœ‰è¶Šç•Œçš„éƒ½ç•™ç€

        index = 0;
        Bullet[] bulletLives = new Bullet[bullets.length];//å­˜å‚¨æ²¡æœ‰å‘ç”Ÿç¢°æ’çš„å­å¼¹
        for (int i = 0; i < bullets.length; i++) {
            Bullet b = bullets[i];
            if (!b.outOfBounds()) {//å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰è¶Šç•Œ
                bulletLives[index++] = b;
            }
        }
        bullets = Arrays.copyOf(bulletLives,index);
    }

    /**
     * æ£€æµ‹æ¸¸æˆæ˜¯å¦ç»“æŸ
     */
    public boolean isGameOver() {
        for (int i = 0; i < flyings.length; i++) {//éå†æ‰€æœ‰é£è¡Œç‰©
            int index = -1;//æ²¡æœ‰å‘ç”Ÿç¢°æ’
            FlyingObject obj = flyings[i];
            if(hero.hit(obj)){//æ£€æŸ¥è‹±é›„é¸¡ä¸é£è¡Œç‰©æ˜¯å¦ç¢°æ’
                hero.subtractLife();//å‡å‘½
                hero.setDoubleFire(0);//åŒå€ç«åŠ›æ¸…é›¶
                index = i;//å°†ç¢°æ’é£è¡Œç‰©çš„ä¸‹æ ‡ç»™åˆ°index
            }
            if(index!=-1){
                FlyingObject t = flyings[index];
                flyings[index] =  flyings[flyings.length - 1];
                flyings[flyings.length - 1] = t;//å‘ç”Ÿç¢°æ’çš„å…ƒç´ å’Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ äº¤æ¢
                flyings = Arrays.copyOf(flyings,flyings.length-1);
            }
        }
        return hero.getLife() <= 0;
    }

    /**
     * æ£€æŸ¥æ¸¸æˆæ˜¯å¦ç»“æŸ
     */
    public void checkGameOverAction() {
        if(isGameOver()){//å¦‚æœå·²ç»ç»“æŸ
            state = GAME_OVER;//æ”¹å˜çŠ¶æ€ä¸ºç»“æŸ

        }
    }
    public void action(){
        //é¼ æ ‡ç›‘å¬äº‹ä»¶
        MouseAdapter i = new MouseAdapter(){
            public void mouseMoved(MouseEvent e) {//é¼ æ ‡ç§»åŠ¨
                if(state == RUNNING) {
                    int x = e.getX();
                    int y = e.getY();
                    hero.moveTo(x, y);
                }
            }
            public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e){//é¼ æ ‡è¿›å…¥
                if(state == PAUSE){
                    state = RUNNING;
                }
            }

            @Override
            public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e) {//é¼ æ ‡é€€å‡º
                if(state!=GAME_OVER&&state!=START){
                    state = PAUSE;//æ¸¸æˆè£…æ€ä¸æ˜¯GAMEOVER ï¼Œé¼ æ ‡ç¦»å¼€çª—å£ ï¼Œè®¾ç½®æš‚åœ
                }
            }

            @Override
            public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent mouseEvent) {
                //é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
                switch(state){
                    case START:
                        state = RUNNING;
                        break;
                    case GAME_OVER://å½“çŠ¶æ€æ˜¯ç»“æŸçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»é¼ æ ‡ï¼Œä¼šé‡æ–°åˆå§‹åŒ–å„ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒçŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸ºå¼€å§‹
                        flyings = new FlyingObject[0];
                        bullets = new Bullet[0];
                        hero = new Hero();
                        score = 0;
                        state  = START;


                }
            }
        };
        this.addMouseListener(i);//å¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
        this.addMouseMotionListener(i);//å¤„ç†é¼ æ ‡æ»‘åŠ¨æ“ä½œ
        //å¯åŠ¨æ‰§è¡Œä»£ç 
        java.util.Timer timer = new java.util.Timer();
        timer.schedule(new TimerTask() {
            public void run() {
                if(state == RUNNING){
                    enterAction();//é£è¡Œç‰©å…¥åœº
                    stepAction();//é£è¡Œç‰©èµ°ä¸€æ­¥
                    shootAction();
                    bangAction();
                    isGameOver();
                    checkGameOverAction();//æ£€æŸ¥æ¸¸æˆç»“æŸ
                    outOfBoundsAction();
                }
                repaint();//é‡ç»˜ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨paintæ–¹æ³•

            }
        }, intervel ,intervel);//10æ¯«ç§’ä»¥åï¼Œæ¯éš”10æ¯«ç§’æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡
    }
    public static void main(String[] args){
        JFrame frame = new JFrame("é£æœºå¤§æˆ˜");//ç”»æ¡†
        ShootGame game = new ShootGame();
        frame.add(game);
        frame.setSize(WIDTH, HEIGHT);//çª—å£çš„å¤§å°
        frame.setAlwaysOnTop(true);//çª—å£åœ¨æœ€ä¸Šè¾¹
        frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);//ç‚¹xå…³é—­
        frame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);//è®¾ç½®çª—ä½“çš„åˆå§‹è®°å½•
        frame.setVisible(true);//å°½å¿«è°ƒç”¨paintæ–¹æ³•
        game.action();




    }
}

è‹±é›„æœº(Hero)

package cn.tede.shoot;

import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;

//è‹±é›„é¸¡
public class Hero extends FlyingObject {

    BufferedImage[] images = {};
    int index = 0;

    private int doubleFire;//åŒå€ç«åŠ›çš„å­å¼¹æ•°é‡
    private int life;//å‘½çš„æ•°é‡

    public Hero() {
        life = 3;
        doubleFire = 0;
        this.image = ShootGame.hero0;
        images = new BufferedImage[]{ShootGame.hero0, ShootGame.hero1};
        width = image.getWidth();
        height = image.getHeight();
        x = 150;
        y = 400;
    }

    @Override
    public void step() {
        if (images.length > 0) {
            image = images[index++ / 10%images.length];
        }
    }

    @Override
    public boolean outOfBounds() {
        return false;
    }

    @Override//é‡å†™
    public boolean hitColumn() {
        return false;
    }

    //å‘å°„å­å¼¹
    public Bullet[] shoot() {
        int xStep = width / 4;
        int yStep = 20;
        if (doubleFire > 0) {//åŒå€ç«åŠ›
            Bullet[] bullets = new Bullet[5];//2
            bullets[0] = new Bullet(x + xStep, y - yStep);
            bullets[1] = new Bullet(x + 3 * xStep, y - yStep);
            bullets[2] = new Bullet(x + 2 * xStep, y - yStep);
            bullets[3] = new Bullet(x + 0 * xStep, y - yStep);
            bullets[4] = new Bullet(x + 4 * xStep, y - yStep);

            doubleFire -= 2;
            return bullets;
        } else {
            Bullet[] bullets = new Bullet[1];
            bullets[0] = new Bullet(x + 2 * xStep, y - yStep);
            return bullets;
        }
    }

    /**
     *
     * @param x:é¼ æ ‡xåæ ‡ä½ç½®
     * @param y;é¼ æ ‡yåæ ‡ä½ç½®
     */
    public void moveTo(int x, int y) {
        this.x = x- width/2;//hero.x+width/2;
        this.y = y - height/2;

    }
    public void addDoubleFire(){
        doubleFire += 40;
    }
    public void addLife(){
        life++;
    }
    //è·å–è‹±é›„é¸¡å‘½æ•°
     public int getLife(){
        return life;
     }

//    public boolean outOfBounds(){
//        return false;
//    }
    //å‡å‘½
    public void subtractLife(){
        life--;
    }
    //é‡æ–°è®¾è®¡åŒå€ç«åŠ›å€¼
    public void setDoubleFire(int doubleFire){
        this.doubleFire = doubleFire;
    }
    //ç¢°æ’çš„ç®—æ³•
    public boolean hit(FlyingObject other){
        int x1 = other.x - this.width/2 ;
        int x2 = other.x + this.width/2 + this.width;
        int y1 = other.y - this.height/2 ;
        int y2 = other.y + other.height + other.height/2;
        return this.x + this.width/2>x1
                &&this.x+this.width/2<x2
                &&this.y+this.height/2>y1
                &&this.y+this.height/2<y2;

    }
}

é£è¡Œç‰©(FlyingObject)

package cn.tede.shoot;
//çˆ¶ç±»
import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;

public abstract class FlyingObject {
    protected int x;//xåæ ‡
    protected int y;//yåæ ‡
    protected int width;//å®½
    protected int height;//é«˜
    protected BufferedImage image;//å›¾ç‰‡

    public int getX() {
        return x;
    }

    public void setX(int x) {
        this.x = x;
    }

    public int getY() {
        return y;
    }

    public void setY(int y) {
        this.y = y;
    }

    public int getWidth() {
        return width;
    }

    public void setWidth(int width) {
        this.width = width;
    }

    public int getHeight() {
        return height;
    }

    public void setHeight(int height) {
        this.height = height;
    }

    public BufferedImage getImage() {
        return image;
    }

    public void setImage(BufferedImage image) {
        this.image = image;
    }
    public abstract void step();
    public boolean shootBy(Bullet bullet){
        int x= bullet.x;
        int y = bullet.y;
        return this.x<x&&x<this.x+width&&this.y<y && y<this.y+height;
    }

    /**
     * æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å‡ºç•Œ
     * @return
     */
    public abstract  boolean outOfBounds();//

    /**
     * æ£€æµ‹æ˜¯å¦ç¢°å¢™
     */
    public abstract boolean hitColumn();
}

å­å¼¹(Bullet)

package cn.tede.shoot;

/**
 * å­å¼¹
 */
public class Bullet extends FlyingObject{
    private int speed = 3;//ç§»åŠ¨é€Ÿåº¦
    public Bullet(int x,int y){
        this.x = x;
        this.y = y;
        this.image = ShootGame.bullet;



    }

    @Override
    public void step() {
        y -= speed;


    }

    @Override
    public boolean outOfBounds() {
        return y<-height;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean hitColumn() {
        return y<-height;
    }
}

å¥–åŠ±èœœèœ‚(Bee)ç±»

package cn.tede.shoot;

import java.util.Random;

//èœœèœ‚
public class Bee extends FlyingObject implements Award{

    private int xSpeed = 1;//xåæ ‡çš„ç§»åŠ¨é€Ÿåº¦
    private int ySpeed = 2;//yåæ ‡çš„ç§»åŠ¨é€Ÿåº¦
    private  int awardType;//å¥–åŠ±ç±»å‹
    public Bee(){
        this.image = ShootGame.bee;
        width = image.getWidth();
        height = image.getHeight();
        y = - height;
        //y = 200;
        x= (int)Math.random()*(ShootGame.WIDTH - width);
        Random r =new Random();
        //int x = r.nextInt(ShootGame.WIDTH - width);
        //x = 100;
        awardType = r.nextInt(2);

    }

    @Override
    public int getType() {//å¥–åŠ±ç±»å‹
        return awardType;
    }

    @Override
    public void step() {
        x+= xSpeed;
        y+= ySpeed;
        if(x>ShootGame.WIDTH - width){
            xSpeed = -1;
        }
        if(x<0){
            xSpeed = 1;
        }
    }

    @Override
    public boolean outOfBounds() {
        return y>ShootGame.HEIGHT;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean hitColumn() {
        return false;
    }
}

package cn.tede.shoot;

public class AirPlane extends FlyingObject implements Enemy{
    private int speed = 2;//æ•Œäººé£æœºç§»åŠ¨é€Ÿåº¦2
    public AirPlane(){
        this.image = ShootGame.airplane;
        width = image.getWidth();
        height = image.getHeight();
        y= -height;
        x = (int)(Math.random()*(ShootGame.WIDTH - width));
//        x = 300;
//        y = 190;
    }

    @Override
    public int getScore() {
        return 5;
    }

    @Override
    public void step() {
        y+=speed;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean outOfBounds() {
        return y>ShootGame.HEIGHT;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean hitColumn() {
        return y>ShootGame.HEIGHT;
    }
}
